name: TARPA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
BHIM / UPI is already showing signs of a market leader as a payment option & we were one the first few who realized the power of BHIM . We have ready to use multi Tier Supply Chain Mobile APP for Customers & also for Suppliers who exchange money via BHIM.


Our Mobile APP & platform is to help common man in India leverage Digital revolution & embrace mobile technology seamlessly. our APP- Mere Appne - Upi Pe Dailies retailer APP  is intended in helping Milkman, Newspaper vendor , Local Kirana , vegetables  Vendors to build Local Customer & receive payment via BHI<


This network of Customers & Local Last Mile Delivery point can easily be leveraged by Agriculture Producers to reach direct with a firm view of demand rather than going blindly .. This platform is to retain value adding supply chain elements & isolating middlemen
name: KBC INNOVATIONS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our startup with main focus on electric vehicle charging stations to provide services to this sunrise industry which has year marked by the government of India to grow with emphasis in the future with an objective of converting by 2030 a 100% of all vehicles produced in the country to electric vehicles. This opens up a huge opportunity for providing services to recharge these electric vehicles.
name: NUVOSTELLA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Agrograde is an agri-tech start-up focused on standardizing and streamlining quality management in fresh produce. Founded in 2018, we have one motto in mind: making the

trade transparent through technology. We are backed by Social Alpha and VIllgro along with some of the leading incubators and accelerators. 


Through Agrograde's patent-pending Artificial Intelligence Technology, fruits and vegetables are assayed in real-time and sorted based on quality, which improves the marketability of the produce and enables fair trade by adding transparency. This helps deliver a higher output by accurately grading, segregating, weighing and packing the produce at the point of aggregation without damaging the integrity of the produce and reducing post-harvest food loss. Our product offerings facilitate in creating a seamless end-to-end process that reduces manual labour requirements and has minimal energy usage even at high loads. A


For additional information, please feel free to reach out to us at kshitij@agrograde.com
name: Agrograde (OCCIPITAL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED)

idea:
Meraki is an innovative, creative corporate gifting agency specializing in giving life to corporate gifting and promotional products. Founded in the year 2016, Meraki specializes in
» Brand communication through Promotional products
» Design services for corporate gifting requirements
» Wholesale promotional product sourcing
At Meraki, our idea of artistry lies in delivering custom corporate gifting solutions that fit every need, context and message. Trust us to make your brand get noticed in the marketplace, whatever be your special niche!
name: MERAKI ART PRIVATE LIMITED
